days.title: Arrival & Opening Ceremony
days.description: Arrive at CDG. Drop bags at hotel in Le Marais. Head to Seine river banks for the opening ceremony viewing party.

days.title: Louvre & Tuileries
days.description: Early morning entry to Louvre to see Mona Lisa. Picnic lunch in Tuileries Garden.

days.title: Versailles Day Trip
days.description: Taking the RER C to the Palace of Versailles. Exploring the Hall of Mirrors and the massive gardens.
